title.rendered: Legal Text: The European Social Fund Plus

content.rendered:
Publication Details

Author(s): European Union
Date: June 2021

The European Social Fund Plus (ESF+) states the need to promote the transition from residential/institutional care to family and community- based care, in particular for those who face multiple discrimination. It is clearly stressed that the ESF+ should not support any action that contributes to segregation or social exclusion.

The European Social Fund PlusDownload

excerpt.rendered: The European Social Fund Plus (ESF+) states the need to promote the transition from residential/institutional care to family and community- based care.
